data.title: Love "burst": Lazar Ristovski divorces after 42 years of marriage with Danica
data.meta_description: The popular actor couple Lazar and Danica Ristovski, after 42 years of marriage, decided to continue their life separately. Get the most important news, free on Viber Danica and Lazar confirmed that they are divorcing after 42 years of marriage. On that occasion, Lazar Ristovski himself announced himself. "We did not separate because of another woman or someone else… Love" burst ": Lazar Ristovski divorces after 42 years of marriage with Danica Read More»
data.text:
The popular actor couple Lazar и Danica Ristovski after 42 years of marriage they decided to continue their life separately.

Danica и Lazar confirmed that they are divorcing after 42 years of marriage. On that occasion, Lazar Ristovski himself announced himself.

"We did not separate because of another woman or another man," he said Lazar for the magazine "Gloria".

They kept everything a secret for a while, then told their closest friends, and soon the information will be published in the media. According to a source close to the family Ristovski, their split occurred late last year. The couple parted with dignity and remained on good terms.

This news shocked many, because they were considered one of the most harmonious celebrity couples and that their love story started during their student days.

- We met at the Academy. It was love from school. It is true that there is a large list of married couples, but I think that percentage is much lower than, say, in the world of doctors. Although, in a way, the actors are also doctors. "For the soul," he once said Lazar Ristovski for the media.

Danica и Lazar they married in 1980, and their marriage has never been tempting.

As it was written, among other things, because at the very beginning they agreed for him to record love scenes, and she did not.

In the marriage they had two sons, Peter, who is a film producer and director, and John, who graduated in economics. The older son is married to the actress Teodora Ristovski, while the younger John and his wife Ljiljana last September received a successor Bogdan.

Lazar in interviews he jokingly said that he often wanted to relax in a male company, with his sons John and Peter, with whom he shares a passion for his favorite hobby, sailing.

Danica she did not hide that when she met him Lazar at the FDA in her first year of study, she fell in love with his charm and beauty.
